message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $1,800,000. What do you think?
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $1,800,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for it. What do you think?
I understand that $1,800,000 is a bit steep, but I was really hoping to get closer to the value I think this product is worth. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,600,000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,600,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1,500,000. This is my final offer, as I'm prepared to purchase from John if we can't come to an agreement.
